title: Can i play LoL Na from SEA ?
body: I've created an NA account and can login but the game dont start and i cant reconnect. help me please ! ( sorry for bad English)

replies.body: You should be able to play on the NA servers from anywhere, but there's always a chance that your physical distance from the servers could affect your connection. Go ahead and try switching to an ethernet cable connection if possible to see if that gives you a better connection.
